text: neohuineun eotteohge hananim-eul bulsinhandan mal-inga ; neohuineun saengmyeong-i eobsneun jonjaeyeossgo geubunkkeseo neohuiege saengmyeong-eul bul-eoneohji anh-eusyeossdeonga? geuleon hu geubunkkeseoneun neohuileul jugge hasigo geuleon hu neohuiege saengmyeong-eul bul-eoneoh-eusil geos-imyeo geuleon hu geubunkkelo neohuineun dol-agage doel geos-ila
